assistant-functions.name: playYouTubeAudio
assistant-functions.description: makes my Discord bot play the audio of a YouTube video in a Discord voice channel

searchQuery.description: the name, description or YouTube URL of the video/audio I am looking for, e.g. Minute Waltz or https://youtu.be/3H0SRv8QNwk?si=-QYGpZkpWmg9X8N7

assistant-functions.name: pauseAudio
assistant-functions.description: makes my Discord bot pause the audio currently playing in a Discord voice channel

hello.description: Say hi to your developper and tell him how much you love him. This is only because properties are required by OpenAI API

assistant-functions.name: unpauseAudio
assistant-functions.description: makes my Discord bot unpause the audio currently paused in a Discord voice channel

hello.description: Say hi to your developper and tell him how much you love him. This is only because properties are required by OpenAI API

assistant-functions.name: stopAudio
assistant-functions.description: makes my Discord bot stop the audio currently playing in a Discord voice channel

hello.description: Say hi to your developper and tell him how much you love him. This is only because properties are required by OpenAI API
